sentences.english: The old basketball star walks gingerly on aching knees.
sentences.chinese: 年迈的篮球明星会因膝盖的伤痛步履蹒跚。

sentences.english: And she saw her husband, the aged Priam, dragged towards the household altar and ruthlessly  butchered there.
sentences.chinese: 年迈的丈夫皮安姆被拖到家庭祭坛残酷地处死。

sentences.english: Her knobbly old hand was outstretched.
sentences.chinese: 她伸出了年迈粗糙的手。

sentences.english: Can you think of elderly parents, always want to cry but no tears.
sentences.chinese: 可自己想起年迈的父母，总是欲哭无泪。

sentences.english: As the angel grows up, her parents grow old and weak.
sentences.chinese: 小天使日渐长大，她的父母也变得年迈体弱起来。

sentences.english: Vader defeated the aged Jedi Knight in a lightsaber duel.
sentences.chinese: 维德在光剑决斗中击败了这位年迈的绝地武士。

sentences.english: The aged Sith Lord was able to outmaneuver Kenobi, and knocked the seasoned Jedi unconscious.
sentences.chinese: 年迈的西斯尊主智胜克诺比，把这位老练的绝地打昏。

sentences.english: I saw an old lady wearing a big classical hat today.
sentences.chinese: 今天我看到一个年迈的女人戴着一顶很大的复古帽子。

sentences.english: Recently, the old ewe was allowed inside the house to watch television.
sentences.chinese: 最近，他们允许这只年迈的母羊进屋看电视。

sentences.english: Once every year, gray-bearded minister of the parish would come into the pulpit and read out from the Book of Homilies.
sentences.chinese: 年迈的牧师每年都会站到到教坛上朗读圣经。

sentences.english: The very old and the very young should always see a doctor about flu.
sentences.chinese: 年迈者和幼儿应该经常去医生处检查是否患有感冒。

sentences.english: Nello and Patrasche lived with a very old man.
sentences.chinese: 尼洛和帕特拉什跟一位年迈的老人住在一起。

sentences.english: Suppose that I get very,very,very old.
There was this elderly gentleman that I met in the Glynn Place Mall last year.
sentences.chinese: 我去年在格林区购物中心遇见了一位年迈的先生。

sentences.english: The old master is training world-class violinists.
sentences.chinese: 这位年迈的大师正在培养一批世界级小提琴家。

sentences.english: The deceased died of old age.

definition: one's late days/to have one foot in the grave
to support/to provide support for/to maintain
